field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #RELATION_ID# - Relation ID #GROUP_ID# - Group ID #USER_ID# - User ID #GROUP_NAME# - Group name #USER_NAME# - User first name #USER_LAST_NAME# - User last name #USER_EMAIL# - User e-mail address #INITIATED_USER_NAME# - Name of sender of invitation #INITIATED_USER_LAST_NAME# - Last Name of sender of invitation #URL# - Path to user messages page #MESSAGE# - Message body
